body.head: Bathroom
body.octave:
So that the pliant and persuadable map will appeal to you I'll imagine that my skin is infinitely extensible like a sewer or a skyline the smog of which is lint
of which of which dear god
body.sestet: it is difficult to be an Indian in a bar wahoo a hud among hoods there is no land that's not a land of asparagus nasturtium chewing gum and ire
